#
# @provenance human-original
# @provenance ai-generated

# @provenance mixed

# @verification standard
# @verification light

# @reviewer <your-email>

# Usage Instructions:
# 1. To use this template, run:
#    git config commit.template templates/git-commit-template.txt
#
# 2. Now when you run `git commit`, this template will appear in your editor
#
# 3. Fill in the description and uncomment the relevant provenance lines
#
# 4. Lines starting with # will be ignored in the final commit message
